title: I'm a mac user and every time I login I get disconnected.
body:
Title basically says it. I consistently 17-15 ms in game but I can't connect.
The only thing that helped so far is reininstalling but that just takes way too long
to do every time. Or if leauge needs to update it won't disconnect me.

Does anyone have a solution for this problem?
If so please comment down below.
Thanks

replies.body: Hey don't worry, PCs have connection issues too.  Most common issues with Macs do tend to be network related, so we luckily have some troubleshooting fixes that should help.  Run through the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up and get you connected to the game server.  Let me know if you have any questions!

One question, what should I do, already did some things but there so many different subjects.
I turned my firewall off though. Now going to try out the hextech repair though. Thanks for replying :)

A reinstall might not help in this case if it's a network related issue.  If that doesn't help, grab the logs from the repair tool and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can dig into this with you and help directly!

Okay thanks for replying so quik.
Have a good day :).
